milestone_1.name: Original SPARC
milestone_1.breakthrough: Integration of quantum-inspired reasoning with AI-assisted development

milestone_2.name: SPARC2
milestone_2.key_innovation: Vectorized AI code analysis and intelligent coding agents
milestone_2.breakthrough: Vector databases for code pattern recognition and secure execution

milestone_3.name: Create-SPARC
milestone_3.key_innovation: Accessible toolkit for SPARC methodology adoption
milestone_3.breakthrough: One-command project initialization with AI guidance

milestone_4.name: Claude-Flow v1
milestone_4.focus: Coordinated AI collaboration for complex development
milestone_4.breakthrough: Up to 10 concurrent specialized AI agents with load balancing

milestone_5.name: Claude-Flow v2
milestone_5.key_innovation: Hive-mind swarm intelligence with neural networks
milestone_5.breakthrough: 87 MCP tools, 27+ neural models, 84.8% SWE-Bench solve rate

evolutionary_progression.methodology_to_intelligence: From structured methodology to intelligent automation
evolutionary_progression.individual_to_swarm: From single AI assistance to coordinated swarm intelligence
evolutionary_progression.simple_to_neural: From basic AI integration to advanced neural networks

phase_1_foundation.philosophy: Structured, iterative development with AI assistance

phase_2_intelligence.philosophy: AI agents as intelligent code collaborators

phase_3_accessibility.philosophy: Advanced methodologies should be accessible to all developers
phase_3_accessibility.approach: Tooling and automation to democratize best practices

phase_4_orchestration.philosophy: Complex tasks require coordinated AI collaboration

phase_5_swarm.philosophy: AI development as self-organizing, intelligent ecosystems
